item.description: Hi! I have a B.Sc. in Business Informatics and an M.Sc. in Cognitive Systems, both from the University of Potsdam. My fascination for machine learning started growing during my master’s program. There I did several projects applied to natural sciences and linguistics. In my final research project, I got in touch with deep reinforcement learning in language-based games. For my master thesis, I applied neural networks for malware detection with the main aspect of investigating the influence of learning multiple tasks at once.
